channel.title: E-commerce competition on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in E-commerce competition on FinanClub

item.title: CPNG
item.description: score:331 Chances: Discussion of Coupang’s potential as an e-commerce business compared to Amazon’s growth trajectory. Upgrading of CPNG shares by TheStreet’s Quant Ratings service. Coverage of Coupang’s Q2 2023 earnings call and its financial performance. Explanation of Coupang’s quarterly profit streak and factors contributing to improved margins.

item.title: EBAY
item.description: score:31 Chances: Analysis of eBay’s intrinsic value using GuruFocus’ valuation method. Discovery of alarms failing to detect deadly gas, raising safety concerns. Exploration of the thrift store experience and its impact on consumer sentiment. Examination of self-made female billionaires under 50, including their business success.
